Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Fields
com.nimsoft.nimbus.PDS.encoding
          Use of this static field can impact other processes in the same JVM. See NimRequest.setCharset(String) and NimSessionBase.setCharset(String) to set the character set for a particular request or session, or set the pds.encoding.charset system property to explicitly set the PDS encoding character set for the entire JVM. 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimConfig.createHashtable(BufferedInputStream)
          no longer used internally... exists for legacy client code that calls it. Use createHashtable(String) instead. 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimSecurity.decrypt(String, String)
          the platform default character set may not be the same as the character set that was used to encrypt the string 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimSecurity.decryptISO(String, String)
          Use decryptUTF8 instead. ISO-8859-1 cannot represent all characters (Japanese and Chinese characters in particular). 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimSecurity.encrypt(String, String)
          Use encryptUTF8 instead. Note that strings encrypted with this function and encryptUTF8 are not compatible. 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimSecurity.encryptISO(String, String)
          Use encryptUTF8 instead. ISO-8859-1 cannot represent all characters (Japanese and Chinese characters in particular). Note that strings encrypted with this function are not fully compatible with encryptUTF8 (characters within the ASCII range are compatible). 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimConfig.getHashtable()
          - @see getMap() 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimConfig.getHashtable(String[])
          @see getMap(String[] sections) 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimConfig.getValueDecrypted(String[], String, String)
          use NimConfig.getValueDecryptedUTF8(String[], String, String) instead, or specify the character set explicitly using NimConfig.getValueDecryptedCharset(String[], String, String, String) 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimUserLogin.login()
          As of version 2.53 this method is replaced with the static login method 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.PDS.setDecoding(String)
          Use of this static field can impact other processes in the same JVM. Use a session-specific character set (see NimSessionBase.setCharset(String) and NimRequest.setCharset(String)) or set the decoding character set for the JVM using the pds.decoding.charset system property. 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimSessionBase.setDisplayName(String)
          Does not do anything. Stop using. 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.PDS.setEncoding(String)
          Use of this static field can impact other processes in the same JVM. Use session-specific encoding instead (see NimSessionBase.setCharset(String) and NimRequest.setCharset(String)) or set the encoding charset for the JVM using the pds.encoding.charset system property. 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimSecurityBase.setKey(String)
          the character set should be specified when setting the key from a String, since it affects the byte array that is generated. 
com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimConfig.setValueEncrypted(String, String, String, String)
          use NimConfig.setValueEncryptedUTF8(String, String, String, String) instead, or specify the character set explicitly using NimConfig.setValueEncryptedCharset(String[], String, String, String, String)
